img_above_text:
![Wukong Longevity 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/89/Wukong_Longevity_18.jpg)
Be sure to inspect the woods behind where the giant was posted, and you'll find one last Crow Diviner guarding a **Treasure Chest** with some materials inside.
img_below_text:
Finally, with every area explored, it's time to get out of here. Cross the large field past the Longevity Road Shrine and you'll find a passage through the cliffs to the nearby temple.
![Wukong Longevity 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/05/Wukong_Longevity_20.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 115 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Longevity 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/89/Wukong_Longevity_18.jpg)
Be sure to inspect the woods behind where the giant was posted, and you'll find one last Crow Diviner guarding a **Treasure Chest** with some materials inside."
            - Following Text: "Finally, with every area explored, it's time to get out of here. Cross the large field past the Longevity Road Shrine and you'll find a passage through the cliffs to the nearby temple.
![Wukong Longevity 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/05/Wukong_Longevity_20.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a snowy, mountainous path leading to a temple complex in the distance. A character, likely the protagonist, is seen walking towards the temple, carrying a staff. This scene follows a section where the player is advised to explore an area for a treasure chest and precedes a directive to exit the current area and head towards a nearby temple. The image serves to illustrate the transition from exploring the woods to moving towards the temple, emphasizing the journey and the environment's atmosphere.
